dev.syndesi.colorconverter.parser.file

Class FormatGeneric

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.syndesi.colorconverter.parser.file.FormatGeneric
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormatAdobeASE, FormatGimp, FormatLibreOffice

    public class FormatGeneric
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic class for converting between internally used color-arrays and standardized file-formats.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Syndesi

        public Color[] importFile(java.lang.String path)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Parses a file and returns its colors.
        Parameters:

      • exportFile

        public void exportFile(java.lang.String path,
                       Color[] palette)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a file from an color-array.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the new file, existing files will be overwritten
        palette - the array of colors which should be included in the final file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - on errors
